# Catch by station


## Loading needed libraries
___

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(fjolst)    # for the time being
library(pax)
```


The stations

```{r}
Station <- 
  husky::STODVAR %>% 
  bind_rows() %>% 
  filter(tognumer %in% 1:39) %>% 
  select(id = synis.id, year = ar, towlength = toglengd, strata = newstrata) %>% 
  mutate(towlength = pax:::trim_towlength(towlength),
         mult = 1) %>% 
  arrange(id)
```
